mods.abstract: Ran-Away, FROM the plantation of the Estate of the late John Grieg, deceased, a mulatto-boy. He is a very light mulatto-boy, with blue eyes and very straight hair, about 5 feet 8 inches high, stout square built, speaking english and a little french, riding a black brown american mule, branded thus : 97. A liberal reward for his apprehension and delivery will be given by the undersigned. M. E. GIRARD, Administrator of said Estate. Lafayette, May 12th., 1855.--tf

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
